Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with significant delays from 54th/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with significant delays from 54th/Cermak.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
